heading: Today
text: Morning snow showers, mostly from I-89 north and east, tapering off.  Lots of clouds north, some breaks of sun, becoming partly sunny through the Champlain Valley and south.  Highs in the 20s.  Light winds, becoming west to northwest near 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy through the north and mountains, with a few localized snow showers north.  Partly cloudy in southern valleys.  Lows zero to 10 above, coldest south.  Winds light, mainly northwest less than 10 mph.

heading: Thursday
text: Morning clouds through the north and mountains, a spotty snow shower, giving way to increasing sunshine.  Becoming mostly sunny south.  Highs in the upper teens to low 20s north, in the 20s south.  Winds northwest 5 to 15 mph.
